object.name: ContactPersonal
object.desc: This object describes any person created as a contact at a school, LEA, or other institution, or associated with a Learner or other Workforce person.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of a person referenced as a contact. Note that this GUID may be the same GUID assigned to a LearnerPersonal and/or WorkforcePersonal object record.

element.name: PersonalInformation
element.desc: Name, demographic, address, email, and phone information for a person acting as a contact.

object.name: HeadTeacherInfo
object.desc: Name and title fo the school's Head Teacher.

element.name: ContactName
element.desc: The name of the head Teacher.

element.name: ContactTitle
element.desc: The official title of the Head Teacher.

object.name: LAInfo
object.desc: This object contains information about a Local Authority (LA). Compare with US/Canada object: LEAInfo

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the LA whose information this is.

element.name: LAId
element.desc: The 3-digit LA number assigned by DfES. CBDS: L1, S1

element.name: LAName
element.desc: The LA's short name to be used for reporting purposes. Normally, the word "Council" should not be included. CBDS: L3

element.name: LAFullName
element.desc: The LA's full name. CBDS: L2

element.name: LAURL
element.desc: URL for the main LA website. CBDS: L4

element.name: LAAddress
element.desc: The LA's main address information.

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: A list of the LA's other addresses, if any.

element.name: LAPhoneNumber
element.desc: The LA's primary phone number.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: A list of the LA's other phone number(s).

element.name: LAContactList
element.desc: A list of contacts within the LA.

object.name: PersonPicture
object.desc: This object contains information about the learner's picture. Compare with US/Canada object: StudentPicture

attribute.name: PersonRefId
attribute.desc: It is important to note that using the same GUID a person may have a LearnerPersonal record, a WorkforcePersonal record, and a ContactPersonal record all at the same time. This same picture is applicable regardless of the associated object type(s).

element.name: SIF_RefObjectList
element.desc: A list of one or more "personal" object type codes representing objects that can be requested for this person using the specified PersonRefId.

element.name: SchoolYear
element.desc: School year for which this enrolment is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006/07 school year).

element.name: PictureSource
element.desc: This element defines the picture. If the Type attribute is URL, this is the location of the picture in [JPEG] format; if Type is JPEG, this is the [JPEG] image data encoded using the Base64 Content-Transfer-Encoding defined in Section 6.8 of [RFC 2045]. CBDS: 100019

element.name: OKToPublish
element.desc: Can the picture be published?

value.name: NO_ESTABLISHMENT
value.desc: No Establishment (for children not on any establishment roll)

value.name: MULTIPLE_PHASES
value.desc: Multiple phases (not Middle, Special, or PRU)

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: The way the picture is specified.

object.name: SchoolGroup
object.desc: This object describes a class or teaching group, including resource and time tabling information. All groups are based upon a SchoolCourseInfo record. However, there are courses which are not based upon any subject area and likewise may not have any teachers or other staff assigned. Compare with US/Canada object: SectionInfo

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this group entity.

attribute.name: SchoolGroupTypeRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies a course upon which this group is centered. Note that this element is mandatory when GroupType is associated with a course (teaching group).

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the group is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006/07 school year). Where a group membership is valid across multiple years, the current year at the time of publication will be used.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned (unique) identifier for this group.

element.name: GroupName
element.desc: The name associated with this group for display purposes.

element.name: Description
element.desc: A textual description.

element.name: ParentSchoolGroupRefId
element.desc: The parent group associated with this group, if any.

element.name: ScheduleInfoList
element.desc: A list of teachers, staff, or other non-learners associated with this group.

object.name: SchoolGroupType
object.desc: This object describes a high-level course or class grouping organised and/or taught within a school or establishment. Note that not all courses are based upon a subject area. One such course is "Class Group" which is the same as a homeroom or registration group. Compare with US/Canada object: SchoolCourseInfo

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID that uniquely identifies a school group type, such as a course.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that references the school or establishment where the course is offered or the registration group exists.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006/07 school year). Where a group membership is valid across multiple years, the current year at the time of publication will be used.

attribute.name: GroupType
attribute.desc: The group type. Teaching groups are used to teach subjects while other groups are organised for various other reasons.

element.name: Code
element.desc: School defined local code for the group, such as the course code, if applicable.

element.name: Title
element.desc: Title of the group.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Textual description for the group.

element.name: SubjectAreaList
element.desc: Subject matter areas taught as part of the group, if any.

object.name: SchoolInfo
object.desc: This object contains basic information about a school or other educational establishment. Compare with US/Canada object with the same name.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID that identifies this school.

attribute.name: LAInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that references the school district of which this school is a member.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: An ID assigned by the publishing agent for this school or establishment. This may be set to any value.

element.name: EstablishmentId
element.desc: DfES Establishment Number for this school. CBDS: S2

element.name: LAId
element.desc: The 3-digit LA number assigned by DfES. CBDS: S1

element.name: SchoolName
element.desc: School's name as indicated on the Annual Schools Census. CBDS: S5

element.name: SchoolFullName
element.desc: School's full name as stated in the Instrument of Government. CBDS: S4

element.name: URN
element.desc: School Unique Reference Number. This number is an alternate to the Establishment Number. CBDS: S3

element.name: SchoolURL
element.desc: URL for the school.

element.name: SchoolAddress
element.desc: The school's published address.

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: Other addresses associated with the school.

element.name: SchoolPhoneNumber
element.desc: The main phone number for this school/establishment.

element.name: OtherPhoneNumberList
element.desc: A list of the school's phone numbers.

element.name: SchoolEmail
element.desc: School's email address for general correspondence. CBDS: S24

element.name: SchoolContactList
element.desc: A list of contacts at the school.

element.name: HeadTeacherInfo
element.desc: Name and title fo the school's Head Teacher.

element.name: Phase
element.desc: The high level code indicating the level of the educational institution.

element.name: SchoolType
element.desc: An indication of the level of the educational institution. CBDS: S521a

element.name: Governance
element.desc: Governance afforded to this school. CBDS: S12

element.name: Intake
element.desc: Intake type. CBDS: S11

element.name: NCYearGroupList
element.desc: Collection of National Curriculum Year Groups offered in this school or establishment. CBDS: S9, S10

element.name: GenderOfEntry
element.desc: Gender of learners allowed for entry to school. CBDS: S8a

element.name: GenderSixthForm
element.desc: Gender of learners allowed for entry to Sixth Form. CBDS: S522

element.name: Boarders
element.desc: Indicates whether the school supports boarders or not. CBDS: S21

element.name: SessionsPerDay
element.desc: The number of sessions in the usual school day (usually two).

element.name: Nursery
element.desc: Indicates whether the school maintains a nursery class or not. Must be NO if Phase is set to MP, MS or SY. Must be YES if Phase is set to NY or EY. CBDS: S14

element.name: Special
element.desc: Indicates whether the school has a special class/unit or not. Must be Yes if Phase = SP. Any details will be stored in the associated SchoolInfoDetail object. CBDS: S15

element.name: OperationalStatus
element.desc: Operational condition of a school.

attribute.name: WorkforcePersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of a teacher, staff member, or other employee participating in a non-learner capacity within this group.

element.name: Role
element.desc: The role associated with this person in the context of this group.

object.name: TermInfo
object.desc: This object provides information about a term; i.e., a reportable period of time. Compare with US/Canada object: TermInfo

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this TermInfo entity.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the school where the term is used.

element.name: SchoolYear
element.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006/07 school year). Where a group membership is valid across multiple years, the current year at the time of publication will be used.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Starting date of the term.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Ending date of the term (CCYYMMDD).

element.name: Description
element.desc: Text-based description of the term.

element.name: TermCode
element.desc: Locally-defined code. Use 'AUT', 'SPR', or 'SUM' for a 3 term year. Otherwise specify the term number within the year. CBDS: S115

element.name: TermsPerYear
element.desc: The number of terms in a given year (3-6). CBDS: S43

element.name: MarkingTerm
element.desc: Does this TermInfo represent a marking period?

element.name: SchedulingTerm
element.desc: Does this TermInfo represent a scheduling term?

element.name: AttendanceTerm
element.desc: Does this TermInfo represent an attendance term?
